author: Ben Brown
title: Dow Futures Soar as Europe Awakes to Coronavirus Recovery
description: The European Covid-19 epicenters of Italy and Spain are emerging from the worst of the virus and cautiously looking at how to ease lockdowns. Will the US follow soon? The post Dow Futures Soar as Europe Awakes to Coronavirus Recovery appeared first on CCN.com
content:
• Dow Jones Industrial Average (DJIA) futures point to a roaring stock market open on Thursday.
  • Coronavirus cases continue to grow exponentially in the U.S. but Europe points to potential recovery.
